title: Alignment & Personalization
description: RLHF, preference modeling, pluralistic alignment; techniques to align large models with human values, individual preferences, and cultural norms.

title: Cognitive & Human-Inspired Signals
description: Eye-tracking, reading times, brain alignment, narrative comprehension; grounding NLP models in cognitive data and human processing patterns.

title: Multilingual & Low-Resource NLP
description: Cross-lingual transfer, zero-shot learning, data augmentation, synthetic corpora; addressing linguistic diversity and under-resourced languages.

title: Multimodal NLP
description: Language + vision, audio, and video; unified embeddings, modality alignment, richer multimodal representations for reasoning and generation.

title: 3D & Neural Rendering
description: Multi-view reconstruction, neural radiance fields (NeRFs), Gaussian splatting, differentiable imaging, computational imaging pipelines

title: Image & Video Synthesis
description: Diffusion / GAN models, controllable generation, temporal consistency, video generation, domain transfer

title: Multimodal & Vision-Language
description: Vision + text / audio, visual reasoning, grounding, embodied perception, vision-language action models

title: AI on Robotics (RLHF)
description: Reinforcement learning from human feedback applied to robotic systems; learning policies, manipulation tasks, and embodied agents through human preferences

title: Terrain Simulation
description: Physics-based terrain generation, procedural landscapes, erosion models, real-time deformation, and realistic environment synthesis

title: Post-Quantum Cryptography
description: Lattice-based, code-based, and hash-based cryptographic schemes resistant to quantum attacks; mathematical foundations for quantum-safe security

title: Multi-Agent Systems
description: Coordination, emergent behavior, swarm intelligence, distributed decision-making; systems where multiple autonomous agents interact and cooperate

title: Graph Neural Networks
description: Learning on graph-structured data, relational reasoning, message passing, graph transformers; applications in knowledge graphs and multi-context systems
